## EnvAdapter.getCameraRig() method

Container object of the local player.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getCameraRig(): THREE.Object3D;
```
**Returns:**

THREE.Object3D

## Remarks


```
- Object to which camera, avatar, and XR controller are added
- Moving target
- Horizontall rotation target
```
